DOC.detailed_description: Participants complete minimum week-long washout period without consumption tomato product prior randomization one four dietary intervention . Men randomize one follow dietary intervention : control low lycopene diet ( ≤ 5 mg/d food ) , daily Prego® spaghetti sauce , daily V8® vegetable juice , daily Campbell's® Tomato Soup . Each tomato product provide 25 35 mg lycopene per day . In order provide dietary intervention typical serve sizes context usual diet devoid tomato source , participant keep daily log document compliance intervention product tomato-restricted diet enrollment day surgery ( ~3 week ) . Study participant ask complete abbreviated dietary history questionnaire ( establish typical consumption pattern various tomato product ) two separate 3-day diet food record , washout intervention period . Blood 24-hour urine sample obtain two time point , one-week washout phase end dietary intervention period . Fresh prostate sample obtain time surgery .
DOC.criteria: To include study , men must : Have biopsyproven , clinically localize adenocarcinoma prostate base standard presurgical staging study Have choose undergo radical prostatectomy treatment disease medical team present possible treatment option Have kidney liver enzyme , CBC , PT/PTT/INR within normal limit Agree sign consent form prior enrollment study Men may participate : Are currently take lycopene `` alternative '' dietary supplement Have history digestive malabsorptive disorder , metabolic enzyme deficiency , disorder require special dietary modification ( control type II diabetes mellitus allow )
